featured.text: With the worsening of global economic conditions, it seems wiser and more _____ to keep cash in the bank rather than to invest in the stock market.
This dietary need has led to a constant battle to keep the deer separate from the unforgiving nature of tons of onrushing rolling stock.
What does the author mean by “the unforgiving nature of tons of onrushing rolling stock” in the third paragraph?
Upon the super typhoon warning, Nancy rushed to the supermarket—only to find the shelves almost ______ and the stock nearly gone.

definition.en_def: A share of ownership in a company or a supply of goods available for sale.
definition.example: I decided to invest in stock to grow my savings.
